cui_name: Malignant neoplasm of stomach stage IV
reasoning: Stomach cancer incidence ~9-10 per 100k globally from GLOBOCAN 2005. Stage IV represents metastatic disease; stage-specific incidence not separately reported in registries. Global average ~9.5 per 100k. High geographic variation due to H. pylori prevalence and screening practices.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC), Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
